casebody.data:
State
v.
Michael Antonio Bullock 194A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 13, 2016 Jon H. Hunt, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Bullock, Michael Antonio. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 13th of July 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of July 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 25th day of July 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
